title: New account time lol.
body: http://tinypic.com/r/2u7woqd/8 yep time for a new account i would say. i am not dealing with those haha and im only lvl 17 so eh. no loss here.

replies.body: just from reading these comments i'm glad they gave you chat restrictions.
probably should learn to mute people :/

yea, i should lol. i never really say anything bad either, thats what is so messed up, i mean yea i say fuck, shit, god damit, and stuff like that. but i also say good kill or gg right after...just my last game i got reported for saying "fucking bullshit, but nice job!" I mean the game is rated M so you would think people would not get so mad at curse words. But they do...
People can report you for cussing and that's probably why your chat is restricted.

i know that is why its restricted, but its retarded. give me 3 messages at the start of the game and only 1 message every 4 mins?!?!?! it makes it to where i can not tell my team anything half the time and they or i die because of it. its a retarded feature that should never have been put in.

Yeah, i agree, but the chat system is an archaic remnant from the time before the ping system. 
Amazing how people abuse it, then complain that they can't abuse it any more.

Don't tell me you're raging at people for playing poorly, then starting new accounts which place you with more new players who play poorly.  You're never going to be happy that way; you'll just find endless excuses to rage and get restricted again.

guy has the right idea.  who cares level 30 or level 3 its almost exactly the same.  any time I get lower priority queue or chat restrict I make a new level 1 account.  its more fun playing new players anyway.
